zUJH5n2xxck.title: ‘Completely nonsensical’: Andrew Weissmann breaks down Donald Trump’s immunity claims
zUJH5n2xxck.author: MSNBC
zUJH5n2xxck.description:
Andrew Weissmann, former top official at the Justice Department, David Jolly, former Congressman from Florida, and Kimberly Atkins Stohr, Senior Opinion Columnist for the Boston Globe joins Michael Steele in for Nicolle Wallace on Deadline White House to discuss the Donald Trump’s legal issues continuing to mount as he appears to close in on the GOP Presidential nomination for a third time.
